<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>10494/156510</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3320</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Why do we give test accommodations?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum geben wir Testanpassungen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi donnons-nous le logement d'essai ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por que nós damos acomodações do teste?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè diamo le sistemazioni della prova?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί δίνουμε τις στεγάσεις δοκιμής;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Por qué damos comodidades de la prueba?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this issue of the ETNI magazine RAG, the writer introduces the EASI website,the site with accessability for persons with disabilities, as well as some findings from an on-line EASI podcast on standardized testing and accommodations, discussing what happens when accommodations are not provided, and what happens when they are!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">accessibility</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">standardized testing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">accommodations.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Ausgabe des ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPENS, stellt der
Verfasser die EASI Web site, die Site mit accessability für Personen 
mit Unfähigkeit, sowie einige Entdeckungen von einem Online-EASI 
podcast auf der standardisierter Prüfung und Anpassungen vor und 
behandelt, was geschieht, wenn Anpassungen nicht zur Verfügung 
gestellt werden, und was geschieht, wenn sie sind!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette issue du CHIFFON de magazine d'ETNI, l'auteur 
présente le site Web d'EASI, le site avec l'accessability pour des 
personnes avec des incapacités, aussi bien que quelques résultats 
d'un podcast en ligne d'EASI sur le test et le logement normalisés, 
discutant ce qui se produit quand le logement n'est pas fourni, et ce 
qui se produit quand elles sont !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta introdução do PANO do compartimento de ETNI, o 
escritor introduz o Web site de EASI, o local com o accessability para
pessoas com inabilidades, as.well.as alguns findings de um podcast em 
linha de EASI em testar e em acomodações estandardizadas, discutindo
o que acontecem quando as acomodações não são fornecidas, e o que 
acontece quando são!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa emissione del PANNO dello scomparto di ETNI, il 
produttore introduce il Web site di EASI, il luogo con il 
accessability per le persone con le inabilità, così come alcuni 
risultati da un podcast in linea di EASI sulla prova e sulle 
sistemazioni standardizzate, discutenti che cosa accade quando le 
sistemazioni non sono fornite e che cosa accade quando sono!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το ζήτημα του ΚΟΥΡΕΛΙΟΎ περιοδικών ETNI, ο 
συγγραφέας εισάγει το EASI ιστοχώρο, η περιοχή με το 
accessability για τα πρόσωπα με ειδικές ανάγκες, καθώς επίσης 
και μερικά συμπεράσματα από ένα σε απευθείας σύνδεση EASI 
podcast στην τυποποιημένες δοκιμή και τις στεγάσεις, συζητώντας
τι συμβαίνει πότε οι στεγάσεις δεν παρέχονται, και τι συμβαίνει 
πότε είναϊ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡En esta aplicación el TRAPO del compartimiento de ETNI, 
el programa de escritura introduce el Web site de EASI, el sitio con 
el accessability para las personas con inhabilidades, así como 
algunos resultados de un podcast en línea de EASI en la prueba y 
comodidades estandardizadas, discutiendo qué sucede cuando las 
comodidades no se proporcionan, y qué sucede cuando son!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zugänglichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">standardisierte Prüfung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anpassungen.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">accessibilité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">test normalisé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">logement.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">acessibilidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">testar estandardizado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">acomodações.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">accessibilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prova standardizzata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistemazioni.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δυνατότητα πρόσβασης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τυποποιημένη δοκιμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στεγάσεις.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">accesibilidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">prueba estandardizada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comodidades.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
